insert.title: Inserting Nodes
insert.description: Insert nodes into the repository as children of a single parent

query_select_one.title: Query, selecting one property
query_select_one.description: Execute a SELECT query, selecting a single property: SELECT someprop FROM [nt:unstructured]

query_variable_props.title: Query, variable properties
query_variable_props.description: Execute a SELECT query with an increasing number of properties: SELECT [prop1, prop2, prop3, ...] FROM [nt:unstructured]
